headline: Is Sandisk (SNDK) Quietly Repositioning Its Board For A New Phase Of Strategic Risk Management?
summary: Sandisk Corporation recently announced that Alexander R. Bradley, Chief Financial Officer of First Solar, joined its board of directors and audit committee effective December 30, 2025. Bradley’s deep operational finance background in global energy and utilities adds fresh sector expertise to Sandisk’s largely independent eight-member board. We’ll now examine how Bradley’s operational finance experience and audit committee role could shape Sandisk’s broader investment narrative going...
